entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 10:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
